name: Cake Mania: Lights, Camera, Action!
summary: Return to Jill Evans'™ hometown of Bakersfield in Cake Mania: Lights, Camera, Action!™, the highly anticipated fifth chapter in one of the most popular time management series of all-time! Help Jack and Jill keep the Evans Bakery running smoothly as they prepare for the arrival of their new baby. Across town, help Chef Gordo grow his burgeoning Italian restaurant and assist Risha with her fashionable new boutique. With updated shop mechanics, equipment upgrades, mouth-watering recipes, and an all-new Relaxed Mode, you'll have Bakersfield on the A-list in no time. Cake Mania - Lights, Camera, Action!™ includes 110 levels of fast-paced fun!
